channel.title: Animating Npc's
channel.description:
ive looked around but i couldnt find on how to animate npc. what i mean is like when it attacks it like head buts you or something and when it dies, it like jumpes up and falls down like jad or something like that cuz currently when it attacks it just stands there and the person just gets hit and when it dies, it just disapears... all help is really appreciaited.
Please dont post if your just gonna flame or go off topic.
